thread.section_title: Le Royal Monceau-Raffles Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel - Review of Le Royal Monceau-Raffles Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Peter_on_a_trip
title: Lovely hotel
text: Everything is designed - with a lot of mirrors. The rooms are large and very functionel. There is a area with "walkin" closet. The bathroom is large with seperated toilet, shower and bathtub. The rooms had everything we needed. The hotel is nicely located in a quit area close to the metro. The breakfast is very tasty and had it all. In the spa woman and men are seperated. So we did not use it much. But it seemed like a well maintained area.
